translation.en: ♪ It's time to make some noise ♪
♪ Feel the music, use our voice ♪
translation.zh: 感受音乐 唱出我们的声音
我是米雅 他是麦克斯

translation.en: ♪ The wheels on the bus go round and round All through the town ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的轮子转啊转 全城转

translation.en: Hi, we're riding the bus to Music Time.
translation.zh:
你好
我们现在坐公交车去音乐时间幼儿园

translation.en: Max loves buses. Don't you, Max?
translation.zh: 麦克斯很喜欢公交车 对吧 麦克斯？
看 麦克斯 我们到了！

translation.en: Higgledy-piggledy hound, it must be time for the secret sound.
translation.zh:
大家一起
仔细听神秘声音的时间到了

translation.en: [whispers] I love this part of music time.
translation.zh: 我喜欢音乐时间的这一部分

translation.en: It's a guessing game where we try to guess a secret sound.
translation.zh:
这是一个猜谜游戏
我们要猜一种神秘的声音

translation.en: The only thing I like more than guessing sounds

translation.zh: 不过我更喜欢发出声音

translation.en: Oh, you always bring the best secret sounds.
translation.zh: 你总是带来最棒的神秘声音

translation.en: What have you got for us today?
translation.zh: 今天给我们准备了什么？

translation.en: [laughs] The right answer might be in there somewhere.
translation.zh: 正确答案可能就在其中
好的 闪闪 是时候猜一猜了

translation.en: A hippo? What sound do they make?
translation.zh: 河马？河马会发出什么声音啊？

translation.en: [chuckles] None of those sound the same to me.
Does anyone else have any idea what it is?
translation.zh: 还有谁知道是什么声音吗？
麦克斯知道 是公交车的喇叭声

translation.en: Oh, we know that song. Don't we, Max?
translation.zh: 我们知道这首歌 对吧 麦克斯？

translation.en: Oh, oh, I like the part that goes…
♪ Up and down, up and down ♪
translation.zh: “上来又下去 上来又下去”

translation.en: The part that goes "swish, swish, swish," really shows off my dance moves.
translation.zh: “沙沙沙”的那段歌词 很能展示我的舞步

translation.en: Okay, okay. This bus needs to make a pit stop
translation.zh: 好的 公交车得休息一下了

translation.en: or we'll never make it onto the rainbow stage.
translation.zh: 否则我们到不了彩虹舞台

translation.en: I think it's time I taught you all how to rest.
translation.zh: 我想是时候教你们怎么休息了

translation.en: I already know how to do that.
[chuckling] Oh, that is one kind of rest, Ahan.
translation.zh: 这是休息的一种方式 阿汗

translation.en: And I… I do enjoy a good nap.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢好好打个盹儿

translation.en: But in music, a rest means stop,
translation.zh: 但是在音乐中 休止意味着停止

translation.en: until it's your turn to go again.
And I know a game we can play to show you just what I mean.
translation.zh: 我们可以玩一个游戏 让你们知道这是什么意思

translation.en: I love it when Timberly does that.
translation.zh: 汀柏莉这样 我很喜欢

translation.en: For this game, Twinkle will be our musical traffic light.
translation.zh:
在这个游戏中
闪闪会当我们的音乐交通灯

translation.en: we all get to go and sing.
translation.zh: 我们就可以向前走并唱起来

translation.en: we get to stop and rest.
[Timberly] ♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的轮子转啊转

translation.en: Good resting. Now, keep watching Twinkle and…
translation.zh: 休止得非常好 现在继续看闪闪 然后走！
现在继续看闪闪 然后走！

translation.en: ♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的轮子转啊转

translation.en: Some rests are longer than others.
[chuckles] Maybe we held that rest a little too long.
translation.zh: 也许休止得太长了一点

translation.en: But I think they got the point.
A rest means stop, until it's your time to go.
translation.zh: 休止就是停下 直到你该继续的时候

translation.en: we all get our chance to shine.
When Twinkle starts the rainbow glow,
translation.zh: 当闪闪开始发出彩虹色的光

translation.en: we know where it's time to go.
[all] ♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的轮子转啊转

translation.en: ♪ Round and round, round and round ♪
♪ The wheels on the bus Go round and round ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的轮子转啊转

translation.en: ♪ The wipers on the bus Go swishy-swish-swish ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的雨刮器沙沙沙

translation.en: ♪ The wipers on the bus Go swishy-swish-swish ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的雨刮器沙沙沙

translation.en: ♪ The people on the bus go up and down ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的人们上来又下去

translation.en: ♪ Up and down, up and down ♪
translation.zh: 上来又下去 上来又下去

translation.en: ♪ The people on the bus go up and down ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的人们上来又下去

translation.en: ♪ The horn on the bus Goes beep, beep, beep ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的喇叭哔哔哔

translation.en: ♪ Beep, beep, beep ♪ ♪ Beep, beep, beep ♪
♪ The horn on the bus goes Beep, beep, beep ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的喇叭哔哔哔

translation.en: ♪ Beep, beep, beep, beep Beep, beep, beep ♪
[all] ♪ The singers on the bus Go la, la, la ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的歌者啦啦啦

translation.en: ♪ The singers on the bus go la, la, la ♪
translation.zh: 公交车上的歌者啦啦啦

translation.en: ♪ Singing together is so much fun ♪
♪ So much fun, so much fun ♪
♪ Singing together is so much fun

translation.zh: 约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特

translation.en: Not really. My name is Ahan,
translation.zh: 其实不是 我的名字叫阿汗 我很喜欢唱歌
我的名字叫阿汗 我很喜欢唱歌

translation.en: Ahan, doesn't that song have a quieter part?
translation.zh: 阿汗 这首歌没有哪部分轻一点吗？

translation.en: Yes, Papa, but my favorite is the loud part.
translation.zh: 有的 爸爸 但我最喜欢的部分很响亮

translation.en: Today we're going to learn about--

translation.zh: 这是今天的神秘声音吗？

translation.en: These mushroom stools make a loud sound when you sit on them.
translation.zh: 坐上这种蘑菇凳 就会发出响声
哇 阿汗 好响啊

translation.en: [laughing] I know, Maple. Loud and so funny.
translation.zh: 对 美宝 又响又好玩

translation.en: Who doesn't love a good, loud, floofy sound?
translation.zh: 谁不喜欢响亮的打嗝声呢？

translation.en: But there are some times we shouldn't be loud.
translation.zh: 但有时候我们不应该大声
真的吗？比如什么时候呢？

translation.en: Like when you need to listen for something important.
translation.zh: 比如当你需要听重要的东西时

translation.en: It's time for the secret sound.
Here comes Tootson. He's always nice and loud.
translation.zh:
嘟嘟火车来了
他总是很棒、声音很响亮

translation.en: What sound have you got for us today?
translation.zh: 今天给我们带来了什么声音？

translation.en: -I don't know it. It's strange. -[Mia] What is that?
translation.zh:
-我听不出 好奇怪
-什么声音？

translation.en: Max says that's the sound our dad makes when he blows his nose.
translation.zh: 麦克斯说是我们爸爸擤鼻涕的声音

translation.en: That's a very good guess, Max,
translation.zh: 猜得真不错 麦克斯

translation.en: but I don't think that's what Tootson had in mind.
translation.zh: 但这恐怕不是嘟嘟火车发出的声音

translation.en: Twinkle, could you show us some guesses?
translation.zh: 闪闪 你能猜几样吗？

translation.en: -A bee? -A bee buzzing around a flower.
translation.zh:
-蜜蜂？
-在花朵旁嗡嗡叫的蜜蜂

translation.en: But I have one more hint.
It's a musical instrument that anyone can play.
translation.zh: 这是一种任何人都能演奏的乐器

translation.en: Do you know what it is?
Ooh, let's find out if you're right.
translation.zh: 我们来看看你猜对没有

translation.en: Are you sure that's an instrument?
[Ahan] Cool. And today we all get to play them.
You just hum into it really loudly.

translation.zh: 你掌握了这个音符 阿汗

translation.en: Now, to play the whole song,
it takes just a bit more effort and some practice.
Almost any instrument can be played loudly or softly.
translation.zh: 几乎任何乐器 都可以响亮或轻柔地演奏
但如果音乐只有一种声音

translation.en: if it only came out one way?
How does loud music make you feel?
translation.zh: 响亮的音乐让你有什么感觉？

translation.en: Excited like I'm the leader of my own parade.
translation.zh: 激动！ 就好像我是游行队伍的首领一样

translation.en: That's a great way to show how loud music can make you feel.
translation.zh: 这确实是一个好方法 展示出响亮音乐给人带来何种感觉

translation.en: Soft music can help us feel cozy
translation.zh: 轻柔的音乐能帮助我们感到舒适

translation.en: Look, I think Max is sleepy.
translation.zh: 看 麦克斯应该是睡着了

translation.en: Do you need a nap, Max?
translation.zh: 你要午睡吗 麦克斯？

translation.en: When it's nap time at home, our mum sings to us very softly.
translation.zh: 在家里午睡的时候 妈妈就会轻柔地唱歌给我们听

translation.en: Maybe we should sing softly now.
translation.zh: 也许我们现在应该轻柔地唱歌

translation.en: I don't know any soft songs.
You can sing any song softly.
translation.zh: 任何歌曲都可以轻柔地唱
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特

translation.en: ♪ Whenever I go out They whisper all about ♪
translation.zh: 每次我出去 他们都低声说
果然有效 现在我明白了
果然有效 现在我明白了 对

translation.en: But when you really want to let loose and have some fun,
translation.zh: 但当你想要放松欢乐的时候
你们知道这意味着什么

translation.en: When Twinkle starts the rainbow glow, we know where it's time to go.
translation.zh:
当闪闪发出彩虹色的光
代表我们要准备出发…
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特

translation.en: ♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.zh: 每次我出去 他们都低声说

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪
translation.zh:
那是
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特

translation.en: ♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.zh: 每次我出去 他们都低声说

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪
translation.zh:
那是
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特

translation.en: ♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.zh: 每次我出去 他们都低声说

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪
translation.zh:
那是
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特

translation.en: ♪ Whenever we go out The people always shout ♪
translation.zh: 每次我出去 他们都低声说

translation.en: ♪ There goes John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt ♪
translation.zh:
那是
约翰·雅各布·金勒海默·施密特

translation.en: [softly] I'm pretending to be a kitten.
[laughing] Come on, little kitten. Off we go.
translation.zh: 来吧 小猫咪 我们走吧

translation.en: I'm still pretending. Do you want to be a kitten with me?
translation.zh: 我还在假装呢 你们想跟我一起当一只小猫吗？

translation.en: -I want to be a kitten. -Me too.
translation.zh: 哇！我想当一只小猫 我也想！来吧 麦克斯 喵
我也想！来吧 麦克斯 喵

translation.en: It must be time for today's secret sound.
translation.zh: 今天的神秘声音时间到了

translation.en: Can kittens play the secret sound game?
translation.zh: 小猫可以玩神秘声音游戏吗？

translation.en: I think I know what it is.
-Timberly, can we see our choices, please? -Absolutely.
translation.zh: 汀柏莉 我们能看一下选项吗？ 没问题

translation.en: Hmm. Do you think it might be a cow?
And it can't be a dog because they go, "Woof-woof."
translation.zh: 也不可能是狗 因为狗叫声是“汪汪”

translation.en: So that leaves us with one last picture.
translation.zh: 这样就只剩最后一张图片了

translation.en: Does anyone know what it is?
Meow. It's a kitten like me.
translation.zh: 喵 是一只像我一样的小猫

translation.en: And I've got just the song for us today.
translation.zh: 我已经准备好了今天的歌曲
一 二 三 四

translation.en: Four pairs of little kitten mittens
Now, we'll need these for today's song, "Four Little Kittens."
translation.zh:
今天的歌曲《四只小猫》
需要这些东西

translation.en: And I'm going to be Mummy cat.
Because, on the rainbow stage today,
translation.zh: 因为在今天的彩虹舞台上

translation.en: you're going to sing as the kitten choir. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你们将以小猫合唱团的身份歌唱

translation.en: I know what a kitten is,

translation.zh: 但合唱团是什么意思啊？

translation.en: Oh, a choir is a group who sing together.
translation.zh: 合唱团就是一群人一起唱歌

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens In fluffy little mittens ♪
translation.zh: 四只小猫戴着毛茸茸的小手套

translation.en: [children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We love our mittens ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 我们喜欢手套

translation.en: It's too hot to dance and wear mittens.
I'll put them down here while we practice.
translation.zh: 练习的时候 我先放在这里

translation.en: The kitten choir sounds so wonderful.
Oh, I can't wait to sing on the rainbow stage later
translation.zh: 我迫不及待上彩虹舞台唱了

translation.en: and show off our kitten mittens.
translation.zh: 还要展示我们的小猫手套

translation.en: Hey, what happened to your mittens, Maple?
translation.zh: 哎 你的手套呢 美宝？

translation.en: Don't worry, Maple. We'll help you find your mittens.
translation.zh: 别担心 美宝 我们会帮助你找到手套
对 我们是小猫合唱团

translation.en: Working together is what choirs do.
translation.zh: 合唱团就应该齐心协力

translation.en: It's what best friends do, too.
Come on, everyone. Help us find Maple's kitten mittens.
translation.zh: 来吧 大家帮助美宝找小猫手套
麦克斯 你找到什么了吗？

translation.en: Can you see my mittens anywhere?
translation.zh: 你看见我的手套在哪里了吗？

translation.en: I must have sat on them by mistake.
translation.zh: 我一定是不小心坐在了手套上

translation.en: Thanks for helping me find my mittens, everybody.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家帮助我找到手套

translation.en: When Twinkle starts the rainbow glow, we know where it's time to go.
translation.zh: 当闪闪开始发出彩虹色的光时 我们就知道应该出发…

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Four little kittens ♪
translation.zh: 四只小猫 四只小猫

translation.en: [children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We lost our mittens ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 我们弄丢了手套

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Let's find your mittens ♪
translation.zh: 四只小猫 去找手套

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we found our mittens ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 我们找到了手套

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Four little kittens ♪
translation.zh: 四只小猫 四只小猫

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we lost our toys ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 我们弄丢了玩具

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Let's find your toys ♪
translation.zh: 四只小猫 去找玩具

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we found our toys ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 我们找到了玩具

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Four little kittens ♪
translation.zh: 四只小猫 四只小猫

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Mummy dear, we lost our treats ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 我们弄丢了点心

translation.en: ♪ Four little kittens Let's find your treats ♪
translation.zh: 四只小猫 去找点心

translation.en: [children] ♪ Oh, Mummy dear We found our treats ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 我们找到了点心
